column1: The Mountains of Mithrim were a range of mountains located in Hithlum.  They formed the border between Mithrim and Dor-l√≥min
column2: and thus between the realms of Fingolfin and his son Fingon after the Noldor settled in Hithlum. The caves of Androth
column3: where some of the Elves of Mithrim dwelt after Nirnaeth Arnoediad
column4: were probably in the Mountains of Mithrim.
